headline: Assessing Invesco (IVZ) Valuation After RBC Capital’s Outperform Upgrade And QQQ ETF Earnings Tailwind
summary: Invesco (IVZ) has been back in focus after RBC Capital upgraded the stock to an Outperform rating, citing stronger organic growth prospects, potential margin expansion, and earnings benefits from the QQQ ETF reclassification. See our latest analysis for Invesco. The RBC upgrade has come on the back of a strong run, with Invesco’s 90-day share price return of 28.62% and 1-year total shareholder return of 74.86% pointing to building momentum rather than a short-term pop. If this kind of move...

headline: Invesco Canada announces cash distributions for its ETFs
summary: Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco") announced today the January 2026 distributions for its exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Unitholders of record on January 29, 2026, will receive cash distributions payable on February 6, 2026.

headline: Exploring Analyst Estimates for Invesco (IVZ) Q4 Earnings, Beyond Revenue and EPS
